Articles.Content: It probably was Starbound? Cause i got an update a few minutes ago ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Seriously, last week was the longest week ever. And this weekend was the longest thing ever. Got all my house chores out of the way so I don't have to do anything today.

> 
> Generally between 7 and 8 AM local for me, which is in about, um, 45 minutes.

Which means it will be at least one hour after the time most people think it will be. My guess is just shy of two hours from now.
Refresh Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã¢â‚¬â€> Find two pages.
Are you going to send Jeb up first or Valentina?
KSP today, WWE2k15 tomorrow. I just need to quit having a life.

> 
> It probably was Starbound? Cause i got an update a few minutes ago ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I think Starbound's update happened a week ago.
im still catching up to the end of the thread guys and gals, we need MOAR HYPE!!!!

I mean, why didn't they do a server migration yesterday then just upload the new files today?

There seems to be the sensible way then the SQUAD way which is to take it to the line every time and hope.
\*sigh\* My computer won't be at my place when I get home, so I can't play KSP 1.0 until tommorow ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
OMG the HYYYPEEE is spilling over, we need to burn it faster to go faster! MAXIMUM HYPE THROTTLE!

> 
> Are you going to send Jeb up first or Valentina?

Val. Jeb's already up, it's her turn to go to Jool on a giant SRB stack.

Stahp speculating the time, you'll shut us down!

As for wikipedia, it's already gone.

![Hyk9VIw.png](http://i.imgur.com/Hyk9VIw.png)

The script will show me a desktop notification if KSP is released

> 
> COMMISSIONER! COMMISSIONER! The Hype Units are on fire and about to explode! \*explosion in the background, Jebidiah riding the shock wave all the way into orbit.\* Correction, the Hype is Exploding into Awesome.

So we're on Hype Stage 2?

Waiting for 1.0...

![0xGxfsy.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/0xGxfsy.jpg)
Main page is still in maintainance mode....
Damn you Squad for releasing KSP 1.0 on a Monday!

Val. Ladies First.
Youtube knows whats up. I played Danger Zone which autoplayed to Eye of the Tiger which autoplayed to (no joking) The Final Countdown. 1.0 may be imminent. This seems like fate.
